controller

Class AppNavigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AppNavigation

  • public class AppNavigation
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses the controller singletons to control the state of the UI and simplify the steps taken to update each window
    Author:
    Manuel Colorado

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppNavigation(ReloadableNode window)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void clearPatient()
      Clears the UI of the system to display no patient
      static void exitApp()
      A global method that determines if the app has been changed or not, and ask the user if the saves must be stored or discard before exiting
      static ReloadableNode getMainWindow()
      Obtains the current main window of the system
      static void loadConfig()
      Loads the Config object containing the initial configuration of the system from a local file
      static void loadPatient(Patient pPatient)
      Loads a patient in the system
      static void loadState()
      Loads the database in the app system
      static void refreshUI(controller.AppNavigation.TypeOfChange change)
      Refreshes the UI of the system
      static void saveConfig()
      Saves the Config object with the system configuration that will always be stored in a local file
      static void saveState()
      Saves the current database state in serialization files
      static void saveUsers()
      Stores the user portion of the database.
      static void setMainWindow(ReloadableNode window)
      Configures the main window
      static void showWindow()
      Starts the main application
      static void updatePatient(Patient newPatient)
      Updates the current patient in the system and refreshes the main application with the current patient details
      static void updateUser(Dentist newUser)
      Updates the state of the application with the new user (Dentist)

        Starts the main application

        Configures the main window

        window - a reference to the main window

      • getMainWindow

        public static ReloadableNode getMainWindow()
        Obtains the current main window of the system
        Returns:
        a reference pointer to the main window so its methods can be called

      • updateUser

        public static void updateUser(Dentist newUser)
        Updates the state of the application with the new user (Dentist)
        Parameters:
        newUser - a Dentist object that will serve as a new user of the application

      • updatePatient

        public static void updatePatient(Patient newPatient)
        Updates the current patient in the system and refreshes the main application with the current patient details
        Parameters:
        newPatient - a Patient object that will be displayed in the app UI

      • loadPatient

        public static void loadPatient(Patient pPatient)
        Loads a patient in the system
        Parameters:
        pPatient - a Patient object that will be displayed in the app UI

      • clearPatient

        public static void clearPatient()
        Clears the UI of the system to display no patient

      • refreshUI

        public static void refreshUI(controller.AppNavigation.TypeOfChange change)
        Refreshes the UI of the system
        Parameters:
        change - a TypeOfChange indicator to indicate the UI which elements needs to be updated

      • exitApp

        public static void exitApp()
        A global method that determines if the app has been changed or not, and ask the user if the saves must be stored or discard before exiting

      • loadState

        public static void loadState()
                      throws PassException
        Loads the database in the app system
        Throws:
        PassException - handles exceptions when loading users as the passwords have been hashed and stored encrypted

      • saveUsers

        public static void saveUsers()
        Stores the user portion of the database. Called when users are updated, passwords are changed or reset

      • saveState

        public static void saveState()
        Saves the current database state in serialization files

      • saveConfig

        public static void saveConfig()
        Saves the Config object with the system configuration that will always be stored in a local file

      • loadConfig

        public static void loadConfig()
        Loads the Config object containing the initial configuration of the system from a local file
